title: mellytinker
author: mellytinker
content: if u have reddit with karma ill pay you daily add me on discord   zaparus#7212

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: mellytinker on November 18, 2022, 06:01:44 PMif u have reddit with karma ill pay you daily add me on discord   zaparus#7212I remember this offer, you have already left it here several times. is it possible that you haven't found anyone for this job in almost a year?Now I am curious about this, can you send me more details in PM and your complete offer? I have 10+ years old Reddit account with 2800+ karma, I can post whenever you want. Currently, I do not use Discord (I am not sure why you insist on them here) it's complicated since I am changing all my devices but forgot the Discord password.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Can you add more details and send them to me on PM too? or you can post most details here. I have 200+ karma and I know that's quite low because I have not been using my reddit account for so long. I want to know more about this task, is this also for the long term? or just a typical one task and get paid job? I tried to message you on discord but I can't.
